2052.course_title_long: Lg Scale Dig Mur Wksp SL
2052.descrlong: Students work with a digital approach to public art project development including analysis of sites, conceptualization, and collaboration using current imaging and video software. Students work in collaboration with specific communities to develop digital images and/or short videos. (Offered fall and spring semesters.)
